languages.text: "Досточтим{mf|ый|ая} {name}... Леди Теодора была сильным лидером, и потому нам следует брать с нее пример. Давайте же проявим мудрость и стойко переживем это горе. Вместе. И продолжим то, что она не успела завершить — приведем протекторат фон Валанциус к еще большему процветанию!"

traits.locale_text: "Досточтимый {name}... Леди Теодора была сильным лидером, и потому нам следует брать с нее пример. Давайте же проявим мудрость и стойко переживем это горе. Вместе. И продолжим то, что она не успела завершить — приведем торговую империю фон Валанциус к еще большему процветанию!"

languages.text: "Esteemed {name}... Lady Theodora was a strong leader, and we ought to follow her example. Let us lean on our wisdom and persevere in spite of this tragedy. Together. And let us carry on where she no longer can by leading the von Valancius protectorate to even greater prosperity!"
languages.original_text: "Досточтим{mf|ый|ая} {name}... Леди Теодора была сильным лидером, и потому нам следует брать с нее пример. Давайте же проявим мудрость и стойко переживем это горе. Вместе. И продолжим то, что она не успела завершить — приведем протекторат фон Валанциус к еще большему процветанию!"

traits.locale_text: "Esteemed {name}... Lady Theodora was a strong leader, and we ought to follow her example. Let us use wisdom and persevere in spite of this tragedy. Together. And let us carry on where she no longer can by leading the von Valancius trade empire to even greater prosperity!"

"Esteemed {name}... Lady Theodora was a strong leader, and we ought to follow her example. Let us use wisdom and persevere in spite of this tragedy. Together. And let us carry on where she no longer can by leading the von Valancius trade empire to even greater prosperity!"

"Esteemed {name}... Lady Theodora was a strong leader, and we ought to follow her example. Let us lean on our wisdom and persevere in spite of this tragedy. Together. And let us carry on where she no longer can by leading the von Valancius trade empire to even greater prosperity!"

"Esteemed {name}... Lady Theodora was a strong leader, and we ought to follow her example. Let us lean on our wisdom and persevere in spite of this tragedy. Together. And let us carry on where she no longer can by leading the von Valancius trade empire to even greater prosperity!"

"Esteemed {name}... Lady Theodora was a strong leader, and we ought to follow her example. Let us lean on our wisdom and persevere in spite of this tragedy. Together. And let us carry on where she no longer can by leading the von Valancius protectorate to even greater prosperity!"

languages.text: “尊敬的{name}……已故的西奥多拉夫人是位强大的领袖，我们应当以她为榜样。让我们依靠我们的智慧，在这场悲剧中齐心协力，坚持下去。她倒下的地方，我们会继续前进，为冯·瓦兰修斯王朝带来更加繁荣的未来！”
languages.original_text: "Esteemed {name}... Lady Theodora was a strong leader, and we ought to follow her example. Let us lean on our wisdom and persevere in spite of this tragedy. Together. And let us carry on where she no longer can by leading the von Valancius protectorate to even greater prosperity!"

traits.locale_text: “尊敬的{name}……已故的西奥多拉夫人是位强大的领袖，我们应当以她为榜样。让我们依靠我们的智慧，在这场悲剧中齐心协力，坚持下去。她倒下的地方，我们会继续前进，为冯·瓦兰修斯王朝带来更加繁荣的未来！”

languages.text: «Mi estimad{mf|o|a} {name}... Lady Theodora era una gran líder y deberíamos aspirar a seguir su ejemplo. A pesar de la tragedia, debemos perseverar y depender de nuestra sabiduría. Unidos. ¡Y seguir adelante aunque ella ya no pueda para llevar al protectorado von Valancius a nuevas cotas de prosperidad!».
languages.original_text: "Esteemed {name}... Lady Theodora was a strong leader, and we ought to follow her example. Let us lean on our wisdom and persevere in spite of this tragedy. Together. And let us carry on where she no longer can by leading the von Valancius protectorate to even greater prosperity!"

traits.locale_text: «Mi estimad{mf|o|a} {name}... Lady Theodora era una gran líder y deberíamos aspirar a seguir su ejemplo. A pesar de la tragedia, debemos perseverar y depender de nuestra sabiduría. Unidos. ¡Y seguir adelante aunque ella ya no pueda para llevar al protectorado von Valancius a nuevas cotas de prosperidad!».

languages.text: 「敬愛なる{name}様…レディ・テオドラは素晴らしい指導者でした。我々も彼女に倣うべきであります。この悲劇を乗り越えるために、皆の知恵を借り、耐え忍んでいきましょう。そして、フォン・ヴァランシウス保護国家をより大きな繁栄へと導くことで、彼女の偉業を引き継いでまいりましょう！」
languages.original_text: "Esteemed {name}... Lady Theodora was a strong leader, and we ought to follow her example. Let us lean on our wisdom and persevere in spite of this tragedy. Together. And let us carry on where she no longer can by leading the von Valancius protectorate to even greater prosperity!"

traits.locale_text: 「敬愛なる{name}様…レディ・テオドラは素晴らしい指導者でした。我々も彼女に倣うべきであります。この悲劇を乗り越えるために、皆の知恵を借り、耐え忍んでいきましょう。そして、フォン・ヴァランシウス保護国家をより大きな繁栄へと導くことで、彼女の偉業を引き継いでまいりましょう！」

languages.text: "{mf|Geschätzter|Geschätzte} {name} ... Lady Theodora war eine starke Anführerin, und wir sollten ihrem Beispiel folgen. Lasst uns trotz dieser Tragödie weise handeln und die Lage meistern. Gemeinsam. Lasst uns fortsetzen, was sie nicht mehr kann, und das Protektorat von Valancius zu noch größerem Wohlstand führen!"
languages.original_text: "Esteemed {name}... Lady Theodora was a strong leader, and we ought to follow her example. Let us lean on our wisdom and persevere in spite of this tragedy. Together. And let us carry on where she no longer can by leading the von Valancius protectorate to even greater prosperity!"

traits.locale_text: "{mf|Geschätzter|Geschätzte} {name} ... Lady Theodora war eine starke Anführerin, und wir sollten ihrem Beispiel folgen. Lasst uns trotz dieser Tragödie weise handeln und die Lage meistern. Gemeinsam. Lasst uns fortsetzen, was sie nicht mehr kann, und das Protektorat von Valancius zu noch größerem Wohlstand führen!"

languages.text: « Vénérable {name}... Dame Théodora était une femme forte, nous nous devons de suivre son exemple. Reposons-nous sur la sagesse accumulée sous ses années de règne et puisons la force de persévérer malgré cette terrible tragédie. Ensemble. Poursuivons son œuvre et menons le protectorat von Valancius à la prospérité ! »
languages.original_text: "Esteemed {name}... Lady Theodora was a strong leader, and we ought to follow her example. Let us lean on our wisdom and persevere in spite of this tragedy. Together. And let us carry on where she no longer can by leading the von Valancius protectorate to even greater prosperity!"

traits.locale_text: « Vénérable {name}... Dame Théodora était une femme forte, nous nous devons de suivre son exemple. Reposons-nous sur la sagesse accumulée sous ses années de règne et puisons la force de persévérer malgré cette terrible tragédie. Ensemble. Poursuivons son œuvre et menons le protectorat von Valancius à la prospérité ! »

languages.text: "Çok kıymetli {name}, Leydi Theodora güçlü bir liderdi. Onu kendimize örnek almalıyız. Bu trajediye rağmen sağduyumuza yaslanmalı ve mukayyet olmalıyız. Hep birlikte. Kendisinin artık ulaşamayacağı yerlere ulaşıp von Valancius protektorasının refahını daha da artıralım!"
languages.original_text: "Esteemed {name}... Lady Theodora was a strong leader, and we ought to follow her example. Let us lean on our wisdom and persevere in spite of this tragedy. Together. And let us carry on where she no longer can by leading the von Valancius protectorate to even greater prosperity!"

traits.locale_text: "Çok kıymetli {name}, Leydi Theodora güçlü bir liderdi ve biz de kendimize onu örnek almalıyız. Yaşadığımız bu trajediye rağmen sağduyumuza yaslanmalı ve mukayyet olmalıyız. Hep birlikte. Onun artık ulaşamayacağı yerlere ulaşalım ve von Valancius protektorasına daha da büyük refah kazandıralım!"
